attributes.action: Request a Dissolution of this Rotten Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is often said in jest that the only honest man to enter Parliament was Guy Fawkes. This Parliament, these MPs, this Speaker, have turned the joke on all of us. Their wholesale abuse of public funds has discredited the entire political system, to the benefit only of extremists. We need a new Parliament and new representatives and we need them now. Please, Prime Minister, for the sake of this Democracy, seek an immediate audience with Queen to request a dissolution of this Rotten Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
